name: Touchgrind
description:
The smash hit Touchgrind is now available for your Mac!

To celebrate the success of Touchgrind and Touchgrind BMX for iPhone and iPad, we release this game for FREE!

REQUIREMENT: Touchgrind is controlled using Multi-Touch technology, thus requires a MacBook (MacBook Late 2009 or MacBook Pro 2008 and newer) or a Magic Trackpad.

Just like in real skateboarding or fingerboarding, Touchgrind is a game of skill that takes 10 minutes to understand but weeks practice to master.

The innovative finger controls together with true physics simulation let you pull off tricks like ollies, shuvits, kickflips, heelflips, impossibles, 5-0, 50-50, crooks, smithgrinds, boardslides, tailslides, darkslides etc in endless combinations.
